disclaimer: Be careful, this action is irreversible! If you want to delay your shipment, please select "Put on hold”. To ensure quality, no orders will be shipped on Fridays.

GROUPING.title: Postpone shipment / combine
GROUPING.explicativeText: Once payment is complete, you can put your shipment on hold in order to combine it with other orders and ship at your convenience with optimised delivery fees. The first month of storage is complimentary, beginning on the date your order is made. Beyond this, storage fees will apply.

STORAGE.title: Storage
STORAGE.notAllowed: This option does not apply because you have not signed up to our long-term storage service.
STORAGE.learnMore: For more information about iDealwine’s storage facilities,
STORAGE.allowed: After payment, your order will be prepared and transferred to your iDeal storage facility.

HOME_DELIVERY.title: Ship to your home or office

RELAY_POINT.title: Pick-up point
RELAY_POINT.noRelayPoint: There is no pick-up point near your address Double-check the address and try again.

giftMessageCheckboxLabel: Personalise your order with a special message, we will print it and put it in your parcel.

nonMatchingAdressesModal.title: Change delivery country
nonMatchingAdressesModal.content: Your delivery country has automatically been updated to correspond with the delivery address indicated in orders you wish to combine. Insure that your shipping country is correct before proceding.
